item.title: Need help Editing Shops And Prices on a 667 rsps
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:2, topic:507144”]Source folder> data/items/unpackedShops.txt

You can change the shops, items, prices, etc there.[/quote]
You can only add/change items + the item amounts in unpackedShops.java.
You have to change the prices in Prices.java.

BTW, once you’re done “editing” the unpackedShops.java file, make sure to delete packedShops.s. Then run the server, and you’re done.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Editing Shops And Prices on a 667 rsps

Source folder> data/items/unpackedShops.txt

You can change the shops, items, prices, etc there.
